channel.title: Posts on Albru's trash can
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Albru's trash can

item.title: Journey of Zireael
item.description: You know that feel when you’re looking for a new keyboard, but nothing seem to suite you well enough? Well, I went through the struggle a while ago and it wasn’t easy. Both for me and the people trying to help me. Motivation My interest in mechanical keyboards started like two years ago (and it’s worth noting I still haven’t tried any), but I kept telling myself that it’s not necessary, that it’s not a thing I really need.

item.title: The beginning
item.description: I’m not quite sure if I can give you proper introduction, but I can at least try. This blog’s main purpose, is getting feedback from you on my projects, so I can make them better and eventually attractive for others. I’d also like to keep anyone who likes my stuff informed about the latest progress and maybe even share a few tips that might help. Please, leave me a message if you have an interesting topic I should write about.
